Package com.bandyer.core_av.audiosession

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AudioSessionListener
    Class which represents an audio session listener.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioSession
    AudioSession class is used to represent and audio session that uses output hardware devices to route audio during audio/video calls. This class performs automatic best hardware selection upgrading audio session from earpiece/speaker to wired headset and, if present, bluetooth devices. This class must be binded to the activity lifecycle calling initialize(context), resume(context), pause(context) and dispose(context) methods Following permission must be added in order to let audio session scan bluetooth devices and modify audio settings:
    AudioSessionOptions
    Class which represents options to be used to initialize audio session module. By default the AudioSession automatically changes between earpiece -> speaker-phone -> wired-headset -> bluetooth devices in this exact order and priority when connected. The proximity sensor is optionally used to automatically switch between earpiece(near) and speaker(far)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AudioOutputDeviceType
    Class which represents an audio hardware output device.
    AudioSessionState
    Class which represents AudioSession class state.
